title: How to See Page Likes on Facebook

steps.title: Open Facebook on your computer or mobile device.
steps.content: Open Facebook on your computer or mobile device. You can go to www.facebook.com on an internet browser, or use Facebook's iPhone or Android app. If you're not automatically logged into Facebook, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in.

steps.title: Click or tap on the Search field.
steps.content: Click or tap on the Search field. This will be on a blue bar at the top of your screen.

steps.title: Type in the name of the page you're looking for.
steps.content: Type in the name of the page you're looking for. The search function will list all matching results as you type.

steps.title: Click or tap on the page from the search results.
steps.content: Click or tap on the page from the search results. Find the page you're looking for in the list of search results and open it. It will open up to this page's home screen.

steps.title: Find the number of likes on the page.
steps.content: Find the number of likes on the page. The total number of likes of the page will be listed on the page's home screen. If you're using a browser, the number of likes will be displayed under the page description and above the About section on the right-hand side of your screen. If you're using the iPhone or Android app, scroll down to the Community section. You will see the total number of likes and followers here.
